sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { // Form state const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', service: '' }); // Form submission state const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitSuccess, setSubmitSuccess] = useState(false); const [submitError, setSubmitError] = useState(false); // Handle input changes const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setSubmitError(false); try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/contact', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const data = await response.json(); if (response.ok) { setSubmitSuccess(true); // Reset form after successful submission setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', service: '' }); // Hide success message after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { setSubmitSuccess(false); }, 5000); } else { setSubmitError(true); console.error('Form submission error:', data.message); } } catch (error) { setSubmitError(true); console.error('Form submission error:', error); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Let's Work Together

We're excited to hear about your project. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

{/* Main Contact Section */}
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Information

We're here to help with any questions you have

Email Us

hello@seraune.com

Call Us

(555) 555-5555

Visit Us

123 Tech Street
San Francisco, CA 94107

Connect With Us

{/* Contact Form */}

Send Us a Message

{submitSuccess && (

Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

)} {submitError && (

Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

)}
{/* Map Section */}

Our Office

123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94107

Hours of Operation

Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Saturday - Sunday: Closed

Get Directions
{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about working with us

How quickly will you respond to my inquiry?

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, we recommend calling our office directly.

What information should I prepare before contacting you?

Having details about your project goals, timeline, budget expectations, and any specific requirements will help us provide you with the most accurate information during our initial consultation.

Do you work with clients outside of San Francisco?

Absolutely! We work with clients all over the United States and internationally. Most of our communication can be handled remotely via video calls and collaborative tools.

What is your typical project process?

Our process typically includes discovery, planning, design, development, testing, and launch phases. We maintain clear communication throughout and involve our clients at every critical decision point.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Project?

Contact us today and let's bring your vision to life!

Let's Talk
); }; export default Contact;
